iw_IL {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%f%N%a%N%d%N%b%N%s %h %e %r%N%%z %T%N%c%N" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryISBNNumber */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryNumber */
    CurrencyElements { 
            "\u05E9\u05D7",
            "ILS ",
            ".",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "Hebrew locale for Israel" }
        Source { "RAP" }
        Address { "Sankt Jorgens Alle 8, DK-1615 Kobenhavn V, Danmark" }
        Contact { "" }
        Email { "bug-glibc@gnu.org" }
        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "Hebrew" }
        Territory { "Israel" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "1.0" }
        Date { "2000-06-29" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: LanguageLibraryUse */
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "^[Yy\u05DB].*" }
        NoExpression { "^[Nn\u05DC].*" }
        YesStr { "" }
        NoStr { "" }
    }
    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%d%t%g%t%m%t%f" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "" }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "" }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "" }
        LongSalutationMr { "" }
        LongSalutationMiss { "" }
        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }
    NumberElements { 
            ".",
            ",",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "\u00A4 #,##0.00;\u00A4 #,##0.00-",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    TelephoneFormat { 
        InternationalFormat { "+%c %a %l" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "" }
        InternationalPrefix { "972" }
    }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            AmPmMarkers{
                    "AM",
                    "PM",
            }
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "hh:mm:ss %P",
                    "HH:mm:ss",
                    "HH:mm:ss",
                    "HH:mm:ss",
                    "z  yyyy MMM dd EEE",
                    "z HH:mm:ss yyyy MMM dd EEE",
                    "dd/MMMM/yy",
                    "dd/MMMM/yy",
                    "{0} {1}",
            }
            dayNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "\u05D0'",
                            "\u05D1'",
                            "\u05D2'",
                            "\u05D3'",
                            "\u05D4'",
                            "\u05D5'",
                            "\u05E9'",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "\u05E8\u05D0\u05E9\u05D5\u05DF",
                            "\u05E9\u05E0\u05D9",
                            "\u05E9\u05DC\u05D9\u05E9\u05D9",
                            "\u05E8\u05D1\u05D9\u05E2\u05D9",
                            "\u05D7\u05DE\u05D9\u05E9\u05D9",
                            "\u05E9\u05D9\u05E9\u05D9",
                            "\u05E9\u05D1\u05EA",
                    }
                }
            }
            monthNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "\u05D9\u05E0\u05D5",
                            "\u05E4\u05D1\u05E8",
                            "\u05DE\u05E8\u05E5",
                            "\u05D0\u05E4\u05E8",
                            "\u05DE\u05D0\u05D9",
                            "\u05D9\u05D5\u05E0",
                            "\u05D9\u05D5\u05DC",
                            "\u05D0\u05D5\u05D2",
                            "\u05E1\u05E4\u05D8",
                            "\u05D0\u05D5\u05E7",
                            "\u05E0\u05D5\u05D1",
                            "\u05D3\u05E6\u05DE",
                            "",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "\u05D9\u05E0\u05D5\u05D0\u05E8",
                            "\u05E4\u05D1\u05E8\u05D5\u05D0\u05E8",
                            "\u05DE\u05E8\u05E5",
                            "\u05D0\u05E4\u05E8\u05D9\u05DC",
                            "\u05DE\u05D0\u05D9",
                            "\u05D9\u05D5\u05E0\u05D9",
                            "\u05D9\u05D5\u05DC\u05D9",
                            "\u05D0\u05D5\u05D2\u05D5\u05E1\u05D8",
                            "\u05E1\u05E4\u05D8\u05DE\u05D1\u05E8",
                            "\u05D0\u05D5\u05E7\u05D8\u05D5\u05D1\u05E8",
                            "\u05E0\u05D5\u05D1\u05DE\u05D1\u05E8",
                            "\u05D3\u05E6\u05DE\u05D1\u05E8",
                            "",
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
